subject: Television
Football
lead_paragraph: Last Sunday, Tim Tebow and the Denver Broncos beat the Pittsburgh Steelers in overtime as 42.4 million viewers tuned in, the most for a wild-card game in at least 24 years.
snippet: Last Sunday, Tim Tebow and the Denver Broncos beat the Pittsburgh Steelers in overtime as 42.4 million viewers tuned in, the most for a wild-card game in at least 24 years.
